text: The R4 OPM demo in the UK...the 1st video representation of this game...bar Zone of the Ender 2, I dont think I was ever so Impressed with a video game ever.  Post ZOE 2, NOTHING came close demo wise.  I love literally 3 games more (Radiant Silvergun, Ikaruga and Gunstar Heroes) but nothing has captivated me more pre release!

text: I remember spending a summer playing this game. I first played a demo of it on a bonus disc that came with a magazine I think and bought it when it came out. I remember thinking the graphics were awesome, with details like the cars leaving light-trails at night. I'm a fan of the RR series and Namco always brings perfectly fitting music that makes you want to keep racing.
author: SupraDarky
